@rachel, Clearly, @mycrocode doesn't know to download the roms and run them him/herself
It runs all the Atari games I remember. Be sure to download roms which are not included.

Works great on Ubuntu 20.04 Mate and played every .bin I tried flawlessly. I love the video output options that smoothly enlarges the screen to look great on super large monitors. Reminds me of yesteryear...
This is great eemulator however for some reason after an update on Manjaro will not open this also happened on my Linux Mint machine.

Lo único malo es que debes descargar los roms (juegos) por aparte pero una vez tengas dichos roms solo resta divertirse y recordar aquellos años maravillosos, gracias a los desarrolladores por este gran emulador. aca dejo el link donde pueden descargar un pack de 1800 juegos (los roms funcionan de maravilla con este emulador.  https://packroms.por-mega.com/pack-de-juegos-atari-2600/
summary: Funciona con todos los roms del Atari 2600
